AUTHORITY TO CARRY OUT BASE CLOSURE ROUNDS IN 2003 AND 2005. The curr_chunk discusses the appointment of members to the Commission under the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990. It specifies deadlines for the expiration of terms for certain members. The text chunk discusses deadlines for the expiration of terms for members of the Commission under the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990. The text chunk discusses the transfer of funds to the Commission for its activities in 2003 or 2005 if no appropriations are made by the end of the second session of the 107th Congress. It also amends the termination date to December 31, 2005, and updates the force-structure plan deadlines to include 2004 and 2006. The text chunk updates the selection criteria deadlines for the Commission's activities in 2003 and 2005, including the force-structure plan deadlines for 2004 and 2006. Modification of base closure authorities under 1990 Base Closure Law. Under Secretary of Defense Selection Criteria, the cost savings and return on investment for military base closures must be based on total cost and savings to the Federal Government. Department of Defense recommendations to the Commission are also amended. The Secretary must consider local government input on military base closures, but recommendations are ultimately based on force-structure plans and criteria. The recommendations must include reasons for considering any local government notices. The statement outlines changes to be made in the privatization process of military installations recommended for closure or realignment after 2000. This includes extending the time frame for completion from 24 to 48 hours. The method of closure or realignment of military installations recommended for closure or realignment after 2000 is determined to be the most cost-effective implementation of the recommendation. SEC. 3. TECHNICAL AND CLARIFYING AMENDMENTS. (a) Amendment to Section 2905(b)(7)(D)(ii)(I) of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 regarding the commencement of the notice period for homeless individuals.
(b) Additional clarifying amendments to the Act by inserting "or realignment" after "closure" in specific provisions. The Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 is further amended to include "or realigned" after "closed" in various provisions, and to insert ", or realigned or to be realigned," after "closed or to be closed" in a specific section.
